statements: SELECT * FROM debtors;
SELECT name, total_debt FROM debtors WHERE total_debt > 1000;
SELECT debtor_id, name, contact_number FROM debtors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM debtors WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT name, last_interaction FROM debtors ORDER BY last_interaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM debtors WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT name, total_debt FROM debtors WHERE total_debt > 5000 ORDER BY total_debt DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, name, contact_number FROM debtors WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND total_debt < 1000;
SELECT name, address FROM debtors WHERE total_debt > 10000 AND last_interaction BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT debtor_id, address FROM debtors WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY debtor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM debtor_communication_logs WHERE debtor_id = 1
SELECT communication_type, communication_details FROM debtor_communication_logs WHERE debtor_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT debtor_id, MAX(log_timestamp) AS latest_log_timestamp FROM debtor_communication_logs GROUP BY debtor_id
SELECT * FROM debtor_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Phone Call'
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description, interaction_timestamp FROM debtor_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp
SELECT * FROM debtor_communication_logs WHERE debtor_id = 123 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT communication_type, communication_details FROM debtor_communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Phone Call' LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT communication_type FROM debtor_communication_logs;
SELECT debtor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM debtor_communication_logs GROUP BY debtor_id HAVING total_logs > 10;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM debtor_interactions WHERE debtor_id = 456 AND interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, message FROM communication_logs WHERE debtor_id = 3;
SELECT name, email FROM debtors WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM debtors WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, resolution_type FROM resolutions WHERE resolved_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, debtor_id, timestamp, message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM debtors WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT resolution_type FROM resolutions;
SELECT debtor_id, MAX(resolved_date) AS latest_resolution_date FROM resolutions GROUP BY debtor_id ORDER BY latest_resolution_date DESC;
SELECT id, debtor_id, timestamp, message FROM communication_logs WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount > 5000;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT resolution_type, resolution_date FROM debt_resolution WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, last_payment_date FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount > 1000 ORDER BY last_payment_date DESC;
SELECT communication_type, communication_date, communication_content FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, last_payment_date FROM debtors WHERE debtor_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY debtor_name ASC;
SELECT resolution_type, resolution_date, resolution_notes FROM debt_resolution WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT debtor_name, communication_type, interaction_type FROM debtors d JOIN communication_logs c ON d.debtor_id = c.debtor_id JOIN interactions i ON d.debtor_id = i.debtor_id WHERE debtor_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT debtor_name, email FROM debtor_details WHERE debtor_id = 2;
SELECT resolution_details, resolution_date FROM resolution_logs WHERE resolved_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM payment_logs ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, amount_owed FROM debt_details WHERE debt_status = 'Unpaid';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT debtor_name, address FROM debtor_details WHERE debtor_id = 2;
SELECT log_date, communication_type FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT debt_status, amount_owed FROM debt_details WHERE amount_owed > 1000;
SELECT debtor_name, email, contact_number FROM debtor_details WHERE debtor_name LIKE 'A%';
